content: As an AI language model, I cannot say which theatre is the most popular amongst locals in Swindon as I do not have access to such information. However, you may be able to gather information from social media channels, local events listings, and word-of-mouth recommendations. Additionally, you can explore reviews and ratings on websites such as Tripadvisor, Yelp or Google. Ultimately, the theatre that is "most popular" may be subjective, as it depends on individual tastes and preferences in terms of what shows and performances they enjoy. It might be worth exploring different theatre venues in Swindon and attending different shows to determine which places and performances are most enjoyable for you.
